column4: hi, i have 4 GB of USB pen Drive, on 2 GB i have data, Can i use my usb drive like a bootable CD, for installation ubuntu gutsy server??
hi, i have 4 GB of USB pen Drive, on 2 GB i have data, Can i use the remaining of my usb drive like a bootable CD, for installation ubuntu gutsy server??
ive heard its possible to install that way. But uve never done so.
you would have to figure otu what ports limewire uses those and block those ports..  it can get tricky with some of those p2p apps
if i found all or maximum ports of limeware, then i can drop them... but problem is this..how to find that ports....
google is our friend. :) Ive no idea what ports it uses. it very likely can change ports also.
